name.en: Number 39: Utopia the Envoy of Light
name.ja: <ruby>Ｎｏ．<rt>ナンバーズ</rt></ruby>３９ <ruby>光<rt>ひかり</rt></ruby>の<ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby> <ruby>希<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>望<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby><ruby>皇<rt>おう</rt></ruby>ホープ
name.ja_romaji: Nanbāzu Sanjūkyū Hikari no Shisha Kibōō Hōpu

text.en:
2 Level 4 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle, except with a "Number" monster. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster you control; the first time it would be destroyed by battle or card effect this turn, it is not destroyed. When the second attack of this turn is declared: You can make this card gain 2500 ATK, and if you do, it gains this effect.
● When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can Special Summon it to your field.
